data.name: Description_Banshee
data.value: In multiplayer, selects a specific target. When attacking, focuses only on the sanity of the chosen target, not the overall sanity. Constantly follows the target. In single-player or if the target leaves the house, acts like a regular ghost. Using the Parabolic Microphone, you can hear a distinctive scream.

data.name: Description_Demon
data.value: Hunts more frequently than other ghosts and can start hunting regardless of sanity level. Increased crucifix range.

data.name: Description_Deogen
data.value: Can hunt from 40% sanity and below. Impossible to hide from. Very fast when not seeing the target, but approaching becomes slow enough to walk away. Has a special sound response through the Spirit Box.

data.name: Description_Goryo
data.value: Very rarely changes its room (almost never). Its D.O.T.S is only visible on cameras + won't show it if the camera operator is in its room.

data.name: Description_Hantu
data.value: Moves faster in the cold, slower in warmer areas of the house. In the cold, you can see freezing breath similar to the player's.

data.name: Description_Jinn
data.value: When the generator is on, it greatly increases speed when the target is far away. Speed decreases at closer distances. If the generator is off, behaves like a standard ghost.

data.name: Description_Mare
data.value: Loves darkness. Hunts at 60% sanity when the room light is off. At 40% when it's on.

data.name: Description_Moroi
data.value: Lots of sanity - slow, little sanity - very fast. Begins to speed up from 45% sanity and below. When answered through a Spirit Box or during a conversation through the Parabolic Microphone, may curse the player, leading to a rapid decrease in sanity.

data.name: Description_Myling
data.value: Moves very quietly. More often produces paranormal sounds in the Parabolic Microphone.

data.name: Description_Obake
data.value: Has a 25% chance not to UV evidence. Also has a special six-fingered handprint.

data.name: Description_Oni
data.value: Very active. Almost never disappears during hunts. Cannot perform a sphere event.

data.name: Description_Onryo
data.value: Can start hunting at 60% sanity and below. Also attacks at any sanity level if 3 candles are blown out.

data.name: Description_Phantom
data.value: When looked at, sanity drops faster. It disappears from photos but does so without interrupting the sound event.

data.name: Description_Poltergeist
data.value: Interacts a lot. Throws many objects, sometimes over long distances, often jerks doors. Useless in empty rooms.

data.name: Description_Raiju
data.value: Can start hunting from 65% sanity if nearby electronics are on (only player equipment counts; house lights and electronics in it do not). Feeds on this electronics and increases speed. Increased sensitivity radius to player electronics.

data.name: Description_Revenant
data.value: Very slow when not seeing the player. Very fast when it does.

data.name: Description_Shade
data.value: Shy. Can hunt from 35% sanity and below but won't start hunting when someone is in its room.

data.name: Description_Spirit
data.value: If smudged, it cannot hunt for 3 minutes.

data.name: Description_Thaye
data.value: Can start hunting from 75% sanity, but ages throughout the game if player in ghost room. When it is old, can only start hunting after reaching a level below 15% sanity.

data.name: Description_TheMimic
data.value: Completely mimics the behavior of other ghosts. Has a Ghostly Light, considered an ability, not evidence.

data.name: Description_TheTwins
data.value: Literally two of them. One slower than other ghosts, the other faster. Can interact with different objects (sometimes in different rooms) simultaneously.

data.name: Description_Wraith
data.value: Can teleport to the player across the entire house and then return to its room (not to be confused with the teleportation event, which occurs near its room). It never steps on salt.

data.name: Description_Yokai
data.value: Can start hunting from 80% sanity if chatted with nearby. During hunts, deaf, foolish, and blind - reduced sensitivity radius to player equipment/sounds.

data.name: Description_Yurei
data.value: During events, significantly drains sanity. If smudged, temporarily stops roaming around the house.
